$$.value: Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#
A specially-made sky-blue wooden chair that's only available in Lith Harbor. Recover 35 HP every 10 seconds.
A comfortable, plush green chair, complete with arm-rests. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.
A comfortable, plush red chair, complete with arm-rests.. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.
Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.  Perfect for a quick break from training.
Catch your breath and relax by sitting on this chair to recover 50 HP every 10 seconds.  Perfect for a quick break from training.
A comfortable, plush yellow chair, complete with arm-rests.. Recovers 50 HP every 10 seconds.
An adorable pink cushion that resembles a seal.  Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.
An adorable blue cushion that resembles a seal.  Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.
Rumored to be crafted in Amoria, this special chair is also known as the Love Seat. Recover 20 HP and 20 MP every 10 seconds.
An adorable white cushion that resembles a seal.  Recovers HP 50 every 10 seconds.
A chair crafted by Jacob. Recovers 75 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#
A powerful chair used often on the battlefield. Recovers 60 HP every 10 seconds.\n#cCannot be traded or dropped.#
A chair straight from the relaxation experts in Florina Beach. Recover 20 HP every 10 seconds.
A light, stylish chair that seems to be sent from the heavens. Recover 30 HP and 30 MP every 10 seconds.
A chair with magical properties crafted in Ellinia. Restores 35 MP per 10 Seconds while sitting.
An adorable grey cushion that resembles a seal.  Recovers HP 60 every 10 seconds.
An adorable gold cushion that resembles a seal.  Recovers MP 60 every 10 seconds.
A beach chair placed in the shades under the palm tree at Ariant. Sit on it to recover HP 40 and MP 20 every 10 seconds.
A specially-made chair that's only available in Mushroom Shrine. Recover 60 MP every 10 seconds.
A white chair commemorating the 5th anniversary of MapleStory. Sit on it to recover HP 35 and MP 10 every 10 seconds.

A small figurine embedded with a gem that emanates heroism.  This item allows you to activate and use the Heroic Statues in the Valley of Heroes.
